Events that occurred on 16 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1881 – Artist Josef Madlener is born.
1891 – Arthur Tolkien and Mabel Suffield marry.
1940 - Artist Margrethe II of Denmark is born.
2007 - The second day of The Children of Húrin Release Party is hosted by Tolkien Gateway.
2020 - Animator Gene Deitch, director of The Hobbit (1966 film) dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
